channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A group of women lowered their biological age by an average of 5 years in just 8 weeks. Here’s how
item.description: Changes to diet, sleep, and exercise along with interventions like relaxation exercises and supplements—could reverse aging, according to research.

item.title: Hezbollah, Israel exchange heavy fire after deadly Israeli strike
item.description: Israel and Lebanon exchanged heavy fire into Sunday, with Israeli warplanes carrying out the most intense bombardment in almost a year of war across L...

item.title: Ohtani clinched 50/50 while making $2 million. Here’s what he was really worth.
Influencers overran a rural Vermont town. Now its locals are fighting back
item.description: During fall foliage season, hundreds of tourists flock to Pomfret, a small town of 900 locals.

item.title: Israel raids and shuts down Al Jazeera’s bureau in Ramallah in the West Bank
item.description: Al Jazeera aired footage of Israeli troops live on its Arabic-language channel ordering the office to be shut for 45 days.

item.title: Why tech giants are turning to nuclear disaster sites to power AI data centers
Hinge CEO says he bribed students with KitKats to get the $400 million-a-year business off the ground
item.description: "We would get dozens of users a day—maybe, if that," Hinge CEO Justin McLeod tells Fortune.

item.title: Harris raised 4 times more than Trump in donations for final election sprint
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris also raised $47 million in the 24 hours after the debate against Donald Trump.

item.title: Intel’s stock seals strong week. But would a Qualcomm merger make sense?
Trump rejects CNN debate against Harris, citing start of early voting
item.description: Harris's campaign said she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to participate in a debate on October 23.

item.title: Motel 6 sold to Indian hotel operator for $525 million
item.description: The deal between Blackstone, which owns Motel 6's parent company G6 Hospitality, and Oravel Stays was announced as an all-cash transaction.

item.title: Fed’s Bowman fears bigger rate cut sends ‘premature victory’ message to markets
Wall Street pours cash into Harris campaign while Musk, crypto sector back Trump
item.description: Harris boosted her war chest in August after raising $361 million, while Trump raised $130 million.

item.title: FBI agents have boarded vessel managed by Synergy Marine Group whose other cargo ship collapsed Baltimore bridge
item.description: A Grace Ocean spokesperson confirmed that the FBI and Coast Guard boarded the Maersk Saltoro in the Port of Baltimore on Saturday morning.

item.title: Dow rises to record high as stocks book weekly gains after Fed rate cut
